name: Smoothspeak
headline: Your personal AI dating coach
description: Smoothspeak is an AI dating coach that you can text. We help you land more dates by improving how you text and speak in romantic scenarios through customized text suggestions and voice role play challenges.
tags: industry:artificial-intelligence; industry:consumer; industry:gaming; industry:dating; industry:ai; location:san-francisco-bay-area

founders.name: Saelig Khattar, Founder
founders.description: Co-founder at Smoothspeak. Previously worked on the growth team for YouTube Premium at Google and did research at the Stanford AI Lab, publishing in conferences such as NeurIPS and Nature Communications.

founders.name: Jana Mithrakumar, Founder
founders.description: Co-founder at Smoothspeak. Building AI apps to help people with dating. MS & BS Electrical Engineering from Stanford.

raw_markdown="[SMOOTHSPEAK](https://www.smoothspeak.ai/</>)
[Sign Up](https://www.smoothspeak.ai/<http:/app.smoothspeak.ai/signup>)[Login](https://www.smoothspeak.ai/<http:/app.smoothspeak.ai/login>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6706e4607b856db89ebe457b/678ff6bdc7eae2ab88578734_Button%20\(2\).svg)](https://www.smoothspeak.ai/<https:/apps.apple.com/us/app/smoothspeak/id6739810324>)
# Level up your text game
Our AI wingman tells you what to say on dating apps, text and socials. It's trained by top dating coaches!
[Use on web for free](https://www.smoothspeak.ai/<http:/app.smoothspeak.ai/signup>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6706e4607b856db89ebe457b/678ff6bdc7eae2ab88578734_Button%20\(2\).svg)](https://www.smoothspeak.ai/<https:/apps.apple.com/us/app/smoothspeak/id6739810324>)
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6706e4607b856db89ebe457b/676164053fc8f7a9e193a43f_Group%201.svg)](https://www.smoothspeak.ai/<https:/www.instagram.com/smoothspeakai/>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6706e4607b856db89ebe457b/676164495db6104892fc4e0d_tiktok_icon%20\(1\)%201.svg)](https://www.smoothspeak.ai/<https:/www.tiktok.com/@smoothspeakai>)
Join 10,000+ users now
[Sign Up for Free](https://www.smoothspeak.ai/<http:/app.smoothspeak.ai/signup>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6706e4607b856db89ebe457b/67193de4a63573f6f608b105_Frame%201948756771.avif)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6706e4607b856db89ebe457b/67193de4a63573f6f608b105_Frame%201948756771.avif)
Built by AI experts from Stanford and Google
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6706e4607b856db89ebe457b/676167300257ae3cdd24f43b_Frame%201948757075.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6706e4607b856db89ebe457b/6744930e6b94f52d0e3194d3_Mask%20group.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6706e4607b856db89ebe457b/6744967bac7a52b42383afea_Black.png)
Testimonials
## Our Users Love Us
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6706e4607b856db89ebe457b/676167c52874cbaa2f93ddea_%E2%80%9C%20\(1\).svg)
I always freeze up on what to say after matching with someone, but the AI hits me with good responses every time. I’ve been getting way better reactions, especially on Hinge and Bumble
##### Dennis
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6706e4607b856db89ebe457b/6706eb6e72b23f765cafcace_%E2%80%9C.svg)
Gave me a great double text to say and I ended up landing a date‍‍
##### Chris
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6706e4607b856db89ebe457b/676167c52874cbaa2f93ddea_%E2%80%9C%20\(1\).svg)
Way better than me spending 30 minutes trying to figure out what to say‍
##### Deeraj
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6706e4607b856db89ebe457b/6706eb6e72b23f765cafcace_%E2%80%9C.svg)
Rizz mode is pretty fun. I’ve been using it on Bumble, and I’m getting more matches than before‍
##### Jay
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6706e4607b856db89ebe457b/676167c52874cbaa2f93ddea_%E2%80%9C%20\(1\).svg)
The AI literally takes the pressure off texting. I just text a screenshot, and it tells me exactly what to say on Hinge. 10/10 would recommend to any guy struggling with texts!
##### Aaron
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6706e4607b856db89ebe457b/6706eb6e72b23f765cafcace_%E2%80%9C.svg)
I’ve never been great at texting, but this app makes it so easy. The suggestions are spot on, and it feels like I’m actually good at keeping the convo going‍
##### Ash
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6706e4607b856db89ebe457b/6706eb8bc13dc7b4e1d43a6e_Vector.svg)](https://www.smoothspeak.ai/<#>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6706e4607b856db89ebe457b/67616b3f2902bb82eb0a23e6_Frame%201948756537.png)
## How It Works
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6706e4607b856db89ebe457b/676169932878e309e62008cf_Frame%201948756776%20\(1\).png)
STEP 1
### Text Screenshots
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6706e4607b856db89ebe457b/676169932878e309e62008cf_Frame%201948756776%20\(1\).png)
  * Text screenshots of dating profiles, text or social media conversations
  * Works with multiple screenshots including combinations of profiles and conversations


![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6706e4607b856db89ebe457b/67802077ff98851c8ae7ecda_Frame%201948756775.png)
STEP 2
### AI Text Suggestions
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6706e4607b856db89ebe457b/67802077ff98851c8ae7ecda_Frame%201948756775.png)
  * Our AI will respond with customized suggestions based on the screenshots 
  * Text our AI back if you want changes or try our RIZZ and other special modes


![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6706e4607b856db89ebe457b/678a1931798234106f9a5a0b_Frame%201948756775%20\(1\).png)
STEP 3
### Like Talking to a Friend !
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6706e4607b856db89ebe457b/678a1931798234106f9a5a0b_Frame%201948756775%20\(1\).png)
  * Chat with our AI like you would with a close friend—easy, natural, and fun. 
  * Not just for text suggestions – ask our AI for general dating advice too 


FAQs
## Frequently Asked Questions
What makes Smoothspeak different from other apps like RizzGPT?
Smoothspeak is a seamless experience over text and doesn't require you to get an app. We also provide text suggestions that are contextualized to your location and sound more natural and authentic. We also believe our suggestions will get you far more responses ;)
Do I have to pay to use Smoothspeak?
Smoothspeak is completely free to use and you can currently send an unlimited number of text suggestion requests. We are planning on releasing premium features in the future.
Can Smoothspeak be used for text conversations on other platforms?
Smoothspeak can be used with any platform. However it was designed to be used with dating apps, text conversations and social media (instagram, facebook etc.) and so performs best with those platforms.
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6706e4607b856db89ebe457b/6706eb8bc13dc7b4e1d43a6e_Vector.svg)](https://www.smoothspeak.ai/<#>)

generated_description:
**Smoothspeak: Your AI Dating Coach**

Founded in 2024 and based in the heart of San Francisco, Smoothspeak is carving a niche in the world of dating technology as your personal AI dating coach. Backed by Y Combinator’s Batch S23, this startup is on a mission to revolutionize the way we connect romantically—making it easier and more effective to navigate the often tricky terrain of dating through smart tech.

### What Does Smoothspeak Offer?

At its core, Smoothspeak provides an AI-powered platform that suggests tailored texting strategies and role-play scenarios for romantic engagements. You text the app with screenshots of your conversations or profiles, and it responds with customized suggestions on what to say next. Imagine having a wingman who’s always ready to hit you up with witty responses and insights—it's like having a dating coach in your pocket.

### Tackling the Text Game

Smoothspeak’s AI is trained by top dating coaches and has been designed to provide responsive and natural-sounding text suggestions that resonate with your unique situation. Whether you're engaging on dating apps like Hinge and Bumble, or just texting someone special, Smoothspeak aims to boost your confidence and texting skills dramatically. Not only can it help you craft the perfect message, but it also adds fun through various role-play scenarios to practice your conversational skills.

### Key Features

- **Free to Use**: Currently, Smoothspeak is completely free, allowing you to request unlimited text suggestions while they plan to roll out premium features in the future.
- **User-Centric Design**: No need to download an app—Smoothspeak operates seamlessly over text. Plus, it’s optimized for dating apps and social media platforms, giving you contextually relevant advice.
- **Community Feedback**: Over 10,000 users have already joined and have shared positive testimonials, highlighting how the service has improved their dating experiences.

### Founders and Team

With a small but mighty team of two, Smoothspeak is guided by Nicolas Dessaigne, a Group Partner at Y Combinator. The founders bring expertise in AI and dating dynamics, making them well-equipped to tackle the nuances of romantic communication.

### Quick Access

- Website: [Smoothspeak](https://www.smoothspeak.ai)
- Sign Up: [Join Here](https://www.smoothspeak.ai/<http:/app.smoothspeak.ai/signup>)
- Login: [Access Your Account](https://www.smoothspeak.ai/<http:/app.smoothspeak.ai/login>)

### In Summary

Smoothspeak is not just another dating app; it's a genuine attempt to help individuals navigate the complex world of dating in a personalized, pressure-free manner. If you’ve ever felt stuck on what to say in a conversation, this intelligent AI dating coach might just be the ally you need to level up your romance game. Check it out and see how it can enhance your dating life.
